{{Description|The falling meteor punishes the unjust.}}
'''Planet Befall''' is [[Zhongli]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This ability applies a persistent {{Geo}} aura for the duration of the Petrification. This Geo aura has the following properties:
** The Geo gauge has '''0.04''' [[gauge unit]]s.
** The Geo gauge does not decay over time. When the petrified ends, the status is fully removed.
** Does not react with other elements.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|ascension|2|Dominance of Earth|increases Planet Befall's DMG by 33% of his Max HP.|character=Zhongli|talent=Planet Befall}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|2|Stone, the Cradle of Jade}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|4|Topaz, Unbreakable and Fearless}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|5|Lazuli, Herald of the Order}}
